code:
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "outDir": "build",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "noImplicitAny": true,
    "module": "commonjs",
    "target": "es6",
    "lib": ["es6"],
    "allowJs": true,
    "checkJs": true,
    "jsx": "react",
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "strict": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules/**/*"],
  "ts-node": {
    "transpileOnly": true
  }
}
